name: Birdsong Delves - UE4 Walk-Sim Art Demo
name_original: Birdsong Delves - UE4 Walk-Sim Art Demo
description:
Overview

This is a walking demo featuring a culmination of art assets and implementation completed in an 8-week period for UW-Stout's Game Art and Engines course. The initial prompt given to me was the Tarot card: The Hermit.

  • View vistas.
  • Speculate the lore of the land.
  • Find the origin of sounds.
  • Enjoy the space.
Controls: Move: WASDMouse: Look Around Credits

Lou Brown - Everything Else

Zapsplat - Sounds

willtate91 - Stylized Procedural Stone Texture

romain.lem - Stylized Rock Tile
